name: Smashing Traffic
description:
Test your skills in controlling the traffic in a 4-way crossing that lacks any traffic lights!

Make the cars go faster by clicking on them, but be careful so they don't hit each other!

To your aid you have walking bonuses that you must hit to maximize your score. Try to advance to the next level and get enough points to beat your friends. Or, if you have the skills, possibly enter the global high score list?



Good luck!
